Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed
Reviews.Author: Fire4Effect
Reviews.Content: I needed to add audio capability to a security camera that did not have a microphone built-in.  I did not have an extra barrel type power connector to spare on the system either.  This device just plugged inline with the existing power and video connection on my camera and added the mini microphone to this circuit with ease.  Also, I found that the sensitivity of the mic was fine, contrary to another reviewer's experience with it apparently.  It is picking up conversations 10 - 20 feet away from where I placed it.  Bottom line is that it did exactly as advertised so I wanted to balance the review here with a positive feedback.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: I bought this microphone for my camera; it can't work even in 1 feet distance in the front of it. The sound quality is pretty bad, and the cord is very thin and fragile. Buyer beware, stay away from it. Don't waste your money.

ProductInfo.Features:
High Sensitive microphone and 12V power regulator built-in box
Audio Output: Max 2.0 Vp-p; Power Supply: 12VDC (± 0.5V)
Power Consumption: 10mA
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Mini Microphone for CCTV Security Camera - Add-on Mini Audio Mic for All Kind Surveillance Video Cameras
